list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: something pledged as security for repayment of a loan, to be forfeited in the event of a default.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she put her house up as collateral for the bank loan
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đặt nhà của mình lên làm tài sản thế chấp cho vay ngân hàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person having the same descent in a family as another but by a different line.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the collateral meanings of a word
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ý nghĩa thế chấp của một từ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: descended from the same stock but by a different line.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a collateral descendant of George Washington
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hậu duệ của George Washington
